m_szDocTitle: Exclusive Model X Review — Tesla Model X Is The Best SUV
m_szDocSumamry: April 17th, 2016 by Kyle Field   Our  CleanTechnica tour de Southern California  was a weekend chock full of electric vehicles to such an extreme that I went from not having seen a Model X in public to seeing them in what seemed like every other parking lot we looked in. Our first real encounter with the Model X was some quality time with Teslarati Founder Gene Liu’s beautiful black-exterior-with-white-interior X at the Unplugged Performance BBQ & Tour . We had time to see what junk could be packed in the frunk, what the white interior looked like up close and in person, and even had a chance
